name: The Sinners
description: The Sinners is a dynamic frontend website exclusively tailored for Dota 2 enthusiasts. It serves as a comprehensive platform that offers a wealth of information and features related to the popular online game. Users can delve into the latest news, patch notes, game updates, hero details, team match results, and leaderboard rankings, all in one centralized hub. With a focus on providing a seamless user experience, the website boasts an intuitive interface and client-side routing, allowing smooth transitions between pages without the need for page reloads. Furthermore, the integration of serverless functions ensures real-time data retrieval and processing, ensuring that users receive up-to-date information at their fingertips.
tested: Logo transformed in particles on starting page
Heroes page with grid for all heroes, filter by attribute or complexity function, search hero function.
Hero page with infos about that specific hero
List with popular and followed teams on Watch Tab on Esports page.
Load more button on Esports Page / Watch Tab
[Esports Page - Schedule Tab] Schedule component of last / upcoming matches, sorted by timestamp (time and date).
Twitch stream player for live games and showcase of last / upcoming matches. [Esports Page / Watch Tab]
Dynamic info graph with infos about player's games on Dota.
Top favourite heroes displayed on player's modal
bugs: Grid of tables filtered by a drop-down menu with the Divisions the teams are playing in. [Esports Page / Watch Tab]
